Origins: On 11 November 2010, the Dead Serious News web site published an article positing that a female mortuary worker had become pregnant after engaging in a sex act with a deceased male:
Description: Although the news media occasionally report real cases of workers or interlopers at mortuaries/cemeteries attempting to engage in sex with bodies of the deceased, this item about a female mortuary worker's becoming pregnant through such an activity is not one of them. It's a spoof from the Dead Serious News site, whose About page notes that "Dead Serious News is a satirical website that is updated on an irregular basis. With the exception of the names of public figures, all names are fictional."
Example: [Collected via e-mail, September 2013] So ... did a dead man really inpregnate a woman at a mortuary?
Claim: A female mortuary worker was arrested after becoming pregnant by one of the corpses she was preparing for burial.
